title: ‘It shaped his identity’: did Éamon de Valera’s ‘Spanish father’ ever exist?
summary: A documentary commemorating the 50th anniversary of former Irish Prime Minister Sean Lemass's death explores the unresolved questions surrounding his paternity. The film aims to delve into the historical context and implications of these mysteries. It highlights Lemass's significant impact on Irish politics and society.

title: Labour has succeeded only in strengthening Farage. The way is now open for Zack Polanski’s Greens | George Monbiot
summary: Guardian columnist George Monbiot argues that Labour's concessions to the hard right and corporate interests have created a significant opportunity for the Green party. He suggests that the new Green party leader is well-positioned to capitalize on this gap. Monbiot's commentary highlights the shifting political landscape in the UK.
